title: Telegram Notifications
webhook-help: This is the string you got when creating your bot in Telegram
roomId:
ID of the Telegram group chat, where the bot is member. 
The bot must be in the room. you get the ID from the room
telegramSendUser-help: The user ID number used to send notifications
message-help: Set a custom message to be placed before the embedded content (up to 512 characters).
